src:
アパート２階から煙、掛け布団１枚焼き女性死亡

01 Nov 2019, 00:09

　１日午前０時４５分頃、名古屋市中村区長筬（ながおさ）町の鉄筋２階建てアパート２階、小浜里加さん（５１）さん方で煙が出ていると１１０番があり、敷いてあった掛け布団１枚を焼いて約２０分後に消えた。女性が掛け布団の上にうつぶせで倒れており、病院に搬送されたが、約４５分後に死亡した。愛知県警中村署は女性が小浜さんとみて身元確認を急いでいる。
text:
Smoke from the second floor of the apartment

01 Nov 2019, 00:09

Around 0:45 am on the 1st, there is 110 when there is smoke on the second floor of a steel-reinforced apartment, Nagaoka-cho, Nakamura-ku, Nagoya, Rika Obama (51). One sheet of comforter was baked and disappeared after about 20 minutes. A woman was lying down on a comforter and was transported to the hospital, but died about 45 minutes later. Aichi Prefectural Police Nakamura Station is rushing to confirm the identity of a woman as Mr. Obama.
